SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.players

Class BoardTile

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.server.model.players.BoardTile
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BoardTile extends Object implements Serializable
This class represents a single tile of the player board.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • BoardTile

      public BoardTile(PlaceableCard card, int row, int col, PlayerBoard board)
      Constructs a BoardTile with specified card, row, column, and player board. When a tile is created, it has all the corners uncovered.
      Parameters:
      card - the card placed in the tile
      row - the row position of the tile
      col - the column position of the tile
      board - the player board
